import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useRef, useState } from 'react' const initialState = { "id": "", "customer_name": " ", "customer_email": "", "product": "", "quantity": '' } const Navbar = () => { const ref = useRef(null) const refClose = useRef(null) const [order, setorder] = useState(initialState); const { customer_name, customer_email, product, quantity } = order; const onChange = (e) => { setorder({ ...order, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) return (
